bibl.title: A New Archilochus Poem.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708. Restored text and translation of the new poem and related fragments more complete than in the Oxyrhynchus edition, illustrated by a multi-spectral image of the papyrus. The apparatus criticus documents suggestions communicated by various scholars to date.
bibl.seg: OBBINK Dirk, A New Archilochus Poem.

P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708. Restored text and translation of the new poem and related fragments more complete than in the Oxyrhynchus edition, illustrated by a multi-spectral image of the papyrus. The apparatus criticus documents suggestions communicated by various scholars to date.
